mapper.select: SELECT d.dept_no, d.dept_name, COUNT(e.emp_no) AS employee_count, SUM(s.actual_pay) AS total_actual_pay FROM employee_salary_summary s JOIN employees e ON s.emp_no = e.emp_no JOIN departments d ON e.dept_no = d.dept_no WHERE s.salary_month = #{salaryMonth} GROUP BY d.dept_no, d.dept_name ORDER BY total_actual_pay DESC
SELECT salary_month, SUM(actual_pay) AS total_actual_pay FROM employee_salary_summary GROUP BY salary_month ORDER BY salary_month
